attributes.action: bring back football to terrestal television
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the normal working man cant afford to attend football or watch it on satelite television due to the high costs of charges so we want it on terestral television so everyone can see it and not just the chosen few after all it is all national game and everyone should have a right to see it

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
